directions: Stir wine, soda, orange juice, 8 lime slices, 8 lemon slices, orange slices, brandy, sugar, Cointreau, grenadine, lemon juice and lime juice in large pitcher to combine. Let stand 30 minutes.
Fill 8 large wineglasses with ice cubes. Divide sangria among glasses. Garnish each glass with remaining lime and lemon slices and serve.
ingredients: 1 750-ml bottle of dry red wine (3 cups)
2 tablespoons Cointreau or other orange liqueur
title: Sangria IV
